name: Old School 8-in-1 bundle
description: This bundle includes titles from 3 main genres: time management, match 3 and tower defense! One thing connects all these titles: they all are done in an old-school manner!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: 1 GHz processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 64 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 900 MB available space
